summary: VA's Veterans Community Care Program allows eligible veterans to receive health care from community providers. During COVID-19 , VA increased telehealth use and prioritized appointments for veterans with the most urgent needs. But some schedulers told us that wait times for community care increased during the pandemic. Because VA doesn't have a wait-time measure for the program, it's unclear how much this affected appointment timeliness...
title: Veterans Community Care Program: VA Took Action on Veterans' Access to Care, but COVID-19 Highlighted Continued Scheduling Challenges
